name: CreativeSetLocaleDetail
desc: The map between the language code and available creative set locale details for that language.

items.name: appPreviewDeviceWithAssets
items.desc: The device display name, fallback device display names, and associated assets.

items.desc: The language of the primary locale for the app used in the Creative Set.

items.desc: The language code, such as en-US.
